# The `DecomposedBitTest` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents the operation icmp (X &amp; Mask) pred C, where pred can only be eq or ne. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Represents the operation icmp (X &amp; Mask) pred C, where pred can only be eq or ne.

Definition at line 97 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/cmpinstanalysis-h">CmpInstAnalysis.h</a>.
